TopicTitle: Aircrafts float in runway at start and can't move

Articles.Content: Hello, I have an strange problem, when I spawn aircrafts in runway they float strangely and can't move, in spite the engines be at full throttle. When I use hyperedit (land ship) to move the vehicle high it falls at 1 m/s full throttle or not (I pressed drop so it isn't captive). This doesn't happen to rovers.
